## WordType type

word entity

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type WordType = {
    id: string;
    uuid?: string;
    name: string;
    defs: DefinitionType[];
    particle: string;
    isOffensive: boolean;
    stems: string[];
    user: string;
    level?: LevelType;
    transcription?: string;
    imgUrl?: string;
    audioUrl?: string;
    tags?: TagType[];
    additionalInfo?: string;
};
```
